possible_reasons: Communication between EEPROM and MCU fails.

error_description: Wired controller temperature sensor failure Communication between temperature sensor and MCU

possible_reasons: Communication between Clock IC and MCU fails.
remarks: The unit can run. Change the wired controller Change the wired controller The unit can run.

possible_reasons: 1.EE components fail; 2.EE components control circuit fails; 3.EE components are inserted incorrectly.

error_description: Brand error between indoor unit and wired controller
possible_reasons: Connected to different brand wired controller.
how_to_deal_with: Change the wired controller to the same brand with indoor unit

error_description: Communication failure between B544 and indoor unit Wired controller touch chip failure
possible_reasons: 1. The wiring between the B544 to the indoor control board connect loose; 2. The sequence of the wiring between the B544 to the indoor control board is wrong; 3. The wiring between the B544 to the indoor control board is failure; 4. The B544 is failure; 5. The indoor control board is abnormally. 1. Reconnect the wiring between the B544 to the indoor control board; 2.Replace the wiring between the B544 to the indoor control board; 3. Replace the wiring between the B544 to the indoor control board; 4. Replace the B544; 5. Replace the indoor control Board.
remarks: The unit can run. Change the wired controller

error_description: Error between slave indoor unit and simplified central controller Communication Error between Slave IDU and simplified central controller
possible_reasons: 1. Reconnect the connection cable referring to the wiring diagram; 2. Reconnect the communication cable; 3. Replace the communication cable; 4. Replace the indoor control board; 5. Check the communication circuit, adjust the DIP switch
remarks: 1. Only for simplified central controller 2. The unit will stop.

error_description: Unbalanced distribution warming Coil temperature difference between the master indoor unit
possible_reasons: and slave indoor unit is too big. 1. Check the installation height difference 2. Check the branch connection pipe. 3. Check the pipe lengh difference of each indoor unit.
remarks: 1. Only for simplified central controller 2. The unit will stop.
